message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is fair.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm moving closer to your number, let's close this deal.
Come on, Bob, we're getting close. 57-43 and we're done.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take 470,000 before it shrinks even more!
